Tulita on Firestone Road

On the ground which in years called Tulita Park here
in Regina, there was a building which had once been
a hospital, and it was burned into what they called
then a home for someone else.

I visited these people regularly; many of my feet
came. Then they moved all patients to Wolseley in
the building which is the Firestone Centre now.
Next and I went and clean some of their floors,
many times. Also they new one and left two
nice to clean them up.

1918.

411 Garant Rd
Regina
